titles: O yes, o yes, I do cry, the bishops bridle will you buy
author: Mill, Tom.
notes: Verse - "Since bishops first began to ride".
At foot: Composed by Tom (A.S.) Mill and mee, and printed new at Pomadie.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
